title: Update footer credit text, header accent color, subtitle copy, and legend dashed labeling

requirements.text: Update the dashboard footer credit to replace the current “Built with love using caffeine.ai” pill/link with the plain text “Built by Hannes @Petersime” (no caffeine.ai wording shown).

quotes:
change Built with love using
caffeine.ai to "built by Hannes @Petersime"

acceptanceCriteria: In TemperatureDashboardPage, the footer no longer displays the words “Built with love using” or “caffeine.ai”.
The footer displays exactly: “Built by Hannes @Petersime”.
The footer remains visually consistent with the existing footer layout (centered, small text), and does not introduce new user-facing text beyond the requested string.

requirements.text: Apply the accent color #65714B to the dashboard title bar (header bar) so the header visually uses the accent color more prominently while keeping readability and the existing layout intact.

Header text remains readable (sufficient contrast) and the logo/title alignment does not break.

No other header titles (including the browser tab title) are changed.
